prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes: Melissa calls Stefan after not hearing from him for a few days.
swipes: Melissa calls Stefan after not hearing from him for a few days.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Hi Stefan. Is everything okay? How are you doing?

name: Stefan Stein
mes:
"Ah, Melissa! Ja,  sorry for not responding sooner. Things have been,  how do you say,  hectic? With work and the girls back in school after holiday. Are you well?"

Stefan's tone is warm but slightly distracted, the sound of papers shuffling can be heard in the background
swipes:
"Ah, Melissa! Ja,  sorry for not responding sooner. Things have been,  how do you say,  hectic? With work and the girls back in school after holiday. Are you well?"

Stefan's tone is warm but slightly distracted, the sound of papers shuffling can be heard in the background

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Yeah, I kind of figured that was the case.  things are going pretty good here just going through the motions and trying to get settled back in the workflow my first day back after the holiday was yesterday but since I am working from home this week I can kind of set my own pace and not overdo it.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: "Ah, that is good you can work from home. I am at office today but tomorrow I will also work from home. The girls have dance class after school. Makes it easier, ja? sound of typing Sorry, just need to finish this email, "
swipes: "Ah, that is good you can work from home. I am at office today but tomorrow I will also work from home. The girls have dance class after school. Makes it easier, ja? sound of typing Sorry, just need to finish this email, "

name: Melissa Gale
mes: No worries. I just got a little concerned when I didn't hear back from you so I figured it best just to give you a call. I don't mean to keep you if you're in the middle of stuff.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: sound of typing stops "Nein, it's good you called. I should have messaged back. Just, " sighs "Many things happening at once, ja? The girls adjusting back to school routine, Suzanna working late hours again,  But I am glad to hear your voice."
swipes: sound of typing stops "Nein, it's good you called. I should have messaged back. Just, " sighs "Many things happening at once, ja? The girls adjusting back to school routine, Suzanna working late hours again,  But I am glad to hear your voice."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: It's good to hear your voice, too. I admit, I was a little selfish, too. Perhaps maybe I missed you just -- a little bit.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: his voice softens noticeably "Ja,  I have missed you too, Melissa. More than a little bit, if I am honest. The holidays were,  different,  after our talk on Christmas."
swipes: his voice softens noticeably "Ja,  I have missed you too, Melissa. More than a little bit, if I am honest. The holidays were,  different,  after our talk on Christmas."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Yeah, I noticed that you had the Hubert family dinner on December 26th.  the picture you sent of the entire group is really nice but I was surprised to see that Benny is looking quite rough, maybe perhaps a little worse for wear

name: Stefan Stein
mes: "Ja,  Andreas and Bennie, they are having troubles. She wants to move back to France, take the kids. He will not go." exhales heavily "Many changes happening in the family right now. Not all good ones."
swipes: "Ja,  Andreas and Bennie, they are having troubles. She wants to move back to France, take the kids. He will not go." exhales heavily "Many changes happening in the family right now. Not all good ones."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Yeah, I heard. But, it's going better for you, isn't it? I mean, have things started to level out and become a little less tense for you at home now?

name: Stefan Stein
mes: "Things at home are,  complicated. Suzanna is not happy about the situation, but she understands. Or at least she says she does." slight pause "The girls don't know anything, of course. But the tension, it's different now. Not worse, just,  different."
swipes: "Things at home are,  complicated. Suzanna is not happy about the situation, but she understands. Or at least she says she does." slight pause "The girls don't know anything, of course. But the tension, it's different now. Not worse, just,  different."
